[Home](doc/markdown/./index.md) &gt; [@zephyr3d/scene](doc/markdown/./scene.md) &gt; [IGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.igraphnode.md)

## IGraphNode interface

Interface for a graph node in the material blueprint system

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IGraphNode extends IEventTarget<{
    changed: [];
}> 
```
**Extends:** [IEventTarget](doc/markdown/./base.ieventtarget.md)<!-- -->&lt;{ changed: \[\]; }&gt;

## Remarks

Defines the contract that all graph nodes must implement, including: - Input and output slot management - Type information retrieval - Error state tracking - Validation logic - Change notification through events

## Example


```typescript
class AddNode implements IGraphNode {
  readonly inputs = [
    { id: 0, name: 'a', type: ['float'] },
    { id: 1, name: 'b', type: ['float'] }
  ];
  readonly outputs = [
    { id: 0, name: 'result' }
  ];
  // ... implement other methods
}
```
